Package ua.pp.ihorzak.alog

Class ALogFileConfiguration

  • Object
    • ALogFileConfiguration
  • public final class ALogFileConfiguration
extends Object
    Represents configuration for ALog file output.

    • Method Detail

      • single

        public static ALogFileConfiguration single​(String filePath,
                                           boolean append)
        Creates ALogFileConfiguration to perform logging output to the single file. Created instance must be passed to ALogConfiguration.Builder.file(ALogFileConfiguration).
        Parameters:
        filePath - Logging output file path.
        append - Flag which indicates behavior in case output file already exists: true if its content should be appended, false if its content should be overwritten.
        Returns:
        ALogFileConfiguration to perform logging output to the single file.

      • chunked

        public static ALogFileConfiguration chunked​(String filesDirectoryPath,
                                            long chunkSizeLimit,
                                            int chunkCount,
                                            ALogChunkFileNameProvider nameProvider)
        Creates ALogFileConfiguration to perform logging output to the multiple (chunk) files with file count and file size limits. In case file size limit exceeds new file (chunk) is created. In case file size limit exceeds the most old file is deleted. In case specified chunk files directory contains files they will be deleted. If logging message exceeds chunk size limit it will be ignored. Created instance must be passed to ALogConfiguration.Builder.file(ALogFileConfiguration).
        Parameters:
        filesDirectoryPath - Logging output files directory.
        chunkSizeLimit - Chunk file size limit (in chars). Must be positive number.
        chunkCount - Chunk file count limit. Must be positive number.
        nameProvider - Chunk file name provider.
        Returns:
        ALogFileConfiguration to perform logging output to the multiple (chunk) files.
